Header: SLAF Base Commander in Wanni Calls on Wanni Commander
Content: The Base Commander of the Sri Lanka Air Force Camp - Vavuniya, Air Commodore L.H Sumanaweera and the Commanding Officer Naval Base - Poonewa, Captain R.P.C.R Fonseka paid a courtesy call on the Commander, Security Forces - Wanni, Major General Rohitha Dharmasiri on Friday (10). During the cordial meeting, the Senior Officers exchanged their views on maintaining security and peace in the Wanni region with proper coordination of troops under Security Force Headquarters - Wanni. At the end of this courteous session, the Commander, Security Forces - Wanni presented a memento to Base Commander, SLAF Camp - Vavuniya and Commanding Officer of the Naval Base - Poonewa.
